markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Duelist's Beacon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1239)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 10</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A spiked glove is attached to the front of this [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=1) (Hardness 6, HP 24, BT 12), functioning as _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42)_. Perforations and slits line the defensive side, shining bright light through them when the item's magic is activated.

<document level="2" id="action-999" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Duelist's Beacon
